title: CH20 Elbow Chair
body: Get inspired by this Style Hans Wegner CH20 Elbow Chair. The elbow chair is one of  most popular creations. Originally designed in 1956, the elbow dining chair is also known as the CH20 chair, in reference to its model number. The seat of the elbow chair is wide as well as padded which, in conjunction with the supportive back, makes it very comfortable.
